entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve handling of CS8974 #69286

PullRequests

Created

  • Exceptions.ThrowEFail() should always be thrown. #69288
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • use void instead of exception when not returning a exception but only throwing it #69287
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Preserve formatting when converting array-expressions to collection-expressions. #69278
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to update expressions like `Array.Empty<T>()` over to using the `[]` collection expression. #69279
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
